data.title: Why was The Last of Us 2 criticized so intensely? I thought the story was better than 95% of all existing video games.
data.meta_description:
Answer (1 of 4): First of all I hope you realize you are asking for spoilers, right? If you didn't then don’t read on.

Still there?, ok, then second I have to warn I’ve not played TLOU2 so I won’t judge the game myself only talk about the controversy itself. I didn’t even complete the first one....
